external_references.description: Dupuy, T. and Faou, M. (2021, June). Gelsemium. Retrieved November 30, 2021.

description: [Gelsemium](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0666) has named malicious binaries `serv.exe`, `winprint.dll`, and `chrome_elf.dll` and has set its persistence in the Registry with the key value Chrome Update to appear legitimate.(Citation: ESET Gelsemium June 2021)
